snippet.title: Clockwork Empires Early Access trailer: "Staving Off Starvation"
snippet.description:
Steam Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/224740

Join the Colonies for Queen & Country, for Glory and Profit, and for the CLOCKWORK EMPIRES! 

Clockwork Empires is a colony-builder game filled with simulated characters, steampunk industrial action, and cosmic horror that is AVAILABLE NOW for PC! (Coming soon on MacOS and Linux.)

For more Clockwork Empires information, please visit:
Website: http://clockworkempires.com/
Community Portal: http://portal.clockworkempires.com/
Blog: http://www.gaslampgames.com/category/clockwork-empires
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GaslampGames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/clockwrkempires
